Reviews.Title: Plastic body easy to broken ,cheap product not recommend.
Reviews.Author: Y. ChunChing
Reviews.Content: 1.Product ship from China take a little longer.2.Inside the package include a Disc that can't read.3.The cam's body broken at my first time use. So I feel plastic body too weak.4.The cam not glue very well. when I first time use I see video on my browser and find out the cam already break away from PCB. I need to glue it back.

Reviews.Title: so. you get what you pay for but ask for know more
Reviews.Author: Stone
Reviews.Content: Works well other than short battery life an gets extremely hot. Extend thw battery life an a better wsy to record. An five stars you'll get.
